Text: Great job! You just finished the first half of the experiment! Please take a short break, up to 3 minutes—you may use this time to use the restroom, or have a quick drink or snack. During the break, there will be a timer that shows how much time is left in your break. After 10 seconds, you will have the option of advancing to the next part of the experiment by clicking the "next" button if you want to continue without using the full 3 minute break.
